title: Rustc hangs due to  possible mutex poisoning

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Rustc stucks on macro expansion.
It reproduces on all rustc versions from 1.46 to 1.51.
Looks, like panic makes mutex  poisoned.

I couldn't  create mre for now. 
```
cargo +nightly -Z time-passes																																											   gdb where					
																																									          │#0  0x00007f67a0cfe9ba in __futex_abstimed_wait_common64 () from /usr/lib/libpthread.so.0
```
